meanings.definition: Showing prudence and circumspection in one's actions.
meanings.sent1: She made the discreetest choice by carefully considering all options.
meanings.sent2: The discreetest way to handle the situation was to wait and observe.
meanings.sent3: His discreetest move was to silently slip away from the party.
meanings.sent4: The cat's discreetest approach to the mouse was like a silent shadow.
meanings.sent5: The discreetest footsteps echoed softly in the empty hallway.

meanings.definition: Having or showing discernment or good judgment in conduct and especially in speech.
meanings.sent1: The discreetest student in the class always knew the right thing to say.
meanings.sent2: Her discreetest comments were always thoughtful and well-received.
meanings.sent3: The discreetest way to win an argument is to listen more than speak.
meanings.sent4: His discreetest advice was like a beacon of wisdom in a sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The discreetest smile conveyed more than words ever could.

meanings.sent1: The discreetest outfit she wore was a simple black dress.
meanings.sent2: His discreetest mannerisms made him blend in effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The discreetest flower in the garden bloomed quietly in a corner.
meanings.sent4: The discreetest color on the canvas added depth to the painting.
meanings.sent5: The discreetest touch of kindness can brighten someone's day.
